comment: She was nice enough, but I don't see how she's gotten high marks on this site. If you don't write about topics she likes, expect a B at most. She actually wrote, "Your opinion is wrong" and "Your point of view is wrong" on people's papers. How can someone's opinion be wrong? She is RIDICULOUS and such a disappointment to writers. Run away.

Feminist approach. I am a great writer. I got my paper back and it had almost no marks but I made a low B. A girl next to me had a completely red paper and made a high A. All that was on my paper was comments disregarding my opinion and saying that it was invalid. The papers in this class were so hard too. STEER CLEAR! Guys, don't even, just don't.
She's amazing. She's a very sweet lady who cares about her students. She's very very very lenient and grades fairly. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

She is just the greatest. Like a funny old aunt with all these random stories. Very fair grader and lenient with due dates. I also took her Careers in Writing class and even though we didn't do much, it did help me focus and figure out things I DON'T want to do as a career. If you want an easy prof that lets you do you own thing, you'll love her.
Great at grading and very lea-nit on how she grades, but she is unorganized and very weird. This sometimes makes the class interesting.
Wow! I can't tell you how much I enjoyed this class.  I adored Dr. Walters. I love teachers like her. She gets to the point and allows the students to go on.  She is very funny!  I loved the class!

Very nice lady! She is very relaxed about the class. You get out early most of the time and work on your papers in class. There are 4 papers that she grades rather easily. She gives you main ideas, but you pick the topics to do the research. I suck at english and made an A. It is an easy A class.
NICE lady!  Class was very, VERY boring, but assignments were easy.  No tests, no final.  I would take her again.
VERY nice lady! class was easy and no "final", just an essay.
Great class. Great teacher. Easy A. No final. 3 easy essays, and some writing projects, but all of it was easy.
